title: Abnormal results of pulmonary function studies
chapter: Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
block: Abnormal findings on diagnostic imaging and in function studies, without diagnosis

Abnormal radiological finding in skin and subcutaneous tissue
exclusion: abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother
certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother
